translation.en: [female officer] Can you tell me your full name? Yasmin Sundermeyer.
[female officer] This is the first time you're arrested for a felony charge,
translation.it: Essendo la prima volta che ti arrestano,

translation.en: so I have to get your DNA.
It's just a mouth swab and a few fingerprints. Okay?
translation.it: Un campione di saliva e le impronte. Ok?

translation.en: Stand right here on the white X.
Face the screen.
Do your left hand first.
So, young lady...
you seriously did...
or allegedly did all this stuff in those house shoes right there?
translation.it: ...ciò di cui sei accusata in pantofole?

translation.en: Now they're all dirty.
[male office] Have you been here before? Any jail?
Did you flee? Did you run?
Got up to, like, 130.
I got away, but then I got caught.
translation.it: Sono fuggita, ma mi hanno presa.

translation.en: So you really didn't get away, did you now?
translation.it: Quindi non sei riuscita a fuggire.

translation.en: Open up your mouth.
So, you know what's going to happen, right? The process?
translation.it: Sai cosa succede ora? Come funziona qui?

translation.en: You have the right to bail. What's your bail?
translation.it: Puoi uscire su cauzione. A quanto ammonta?

translation.en: Hundred thousand dollars.
Someone can bail you out.
Otherwise, you're gonna see a judge on Tuesday.
translation.it: Se no, vedrai il giudice martedì.

translation.en: So... you'll get arraigned,
you'll enter your plea,
and then go from there.
Questions, comments, concerns?
All right.
Best of luck to you.
Head all the way down to your left.
You can use the phone in there.
You can call any of the bail bondsman's numbers
translation.it: Puoi chiamare un garante di cauzione,

translation.en: or any of your family members or friends.
translation.it: o un familiare o un amico.

translation.en: [woman shouts] Hello?
Hello? Hello?
[woman] Oh, my fucking God!
What are you doing?
Being in here in jail, it'll break you.
Nobody in their right mind wants to be sitting
translation.it: Nessuno sano di mente vorrebbe stare

translation.en: in a cell like this, caged up.
And this place is clearly crazy.
translation.it: Questo posto è una gabbia di matti.

translation.en: [female officer] At the Sacramento County Main Jail,
there are over 2,400 male and female inmates.
translation.it: ci sono 2.400 detenuti fra uomini e donne.

translation.en: Jail is like a small town, but not like a normal small town.
translation.it: Il carcere è come una piccola città, ma non di quelle normali.

translation.en: You gotta pick up on a whole new set of rules.
translation.it: Devi imparare tutta una serie di regole.

translation.en: Everyone is in everybody's business
because our lives are really right on top of each other.
translation.it: dato che viviamo tutte a stretto contatto.

translation.en: There's no privacy in jail. We're women, we get periods.
translation.it: Non c'è privacy qui. Ci viene il ciclo,

translation.en: You know? We all gotta use the restroom, all that, you gotta get used to that.
translation.it: usiamo il bagno insieme. Devi abituartici.

translation.en: [inmate] And then there's relationship drama, so it gets even worse in here.
translation.it: Nascono degli amori e questo peggiora le cose.

translation.en: One day, the one girl is dating one girl
and the next day somebody is dating somebody else.
It's like a cluster fuck.
You gotta know who's around you,
you gotta know who you can trust. You gotta know all your enemies.
translation.it: sapere di chi puoi fidarti e chi sono i tuoi nemici.

translation.en: [guard] Back it up.
Go to your cells now!
[inmate] But when you find a good friend in here
it makes the time very easy.
translation.it: il tempo passa più in fretta.

translation.en: I'm not gonna let this place eat me up or make me miserable.
translation.it: Non mi farò intristire da questo posto.

translation.en: [inmate] We might be locked up physically
but mentally and emotionally, I'm-- I'm free as fuck.
translation.it: ma mentalmente ed emotivamente sono libera.

translation.en: Can't nothing stop my shine.
-I'm rollin'! -I'm rollin'!
But it's really bad still. Like, I hate it.
translation.it: Ma resta un postaccio. Lo odio.

translation.en: [male voice on PA] All right, ladies, once again, come out... then we'll do day room.
translation.it: Signorine, ripeto. Potete uscire in sala comune.

translation.en: Whatcha doing?
You draw my picture yet?
You got talent, girl! You're gonna go somewhere in life.
translation.it: Hai talento. Avrai successo nella vita.

translation.en: We're a jail, so most people that are housed here
translation.it: In un carcere di contea, i detenuti

translation.en: are either waiting to go to court or they're waiting to be sentenced.
translation.it: sono in attesa del processo o della sentenza.

translation.en: We see all different types of arrests.
Ones from DUI all the way to homicide.
translation.it: Da guida in stato di ebbrezza all'omicidio.

translation.en: All right, I need a shower after you.
translation.it: Faccio la doccia dopo di te.

translation.en: I would get in with her, but we can't.
Ten percent of the population here are women,
and they're only housed on the 7th floor.
-[door knocks] -What's going on?
[inmate] Let me out!
I need you to calm down
and wait for your turn to go out for day room, all right?
translation.it: e aspettare il tuo turno per uscire in sala comune.

translation.en: By law, they only have to let you out for, like, three hours out of the week.
translation.it: Per legge, devono farti uscire per almeno tre ore a settimana.

translation.en: Our shifts over here, like, our officers are pretty cool.
translation.it: Gli agenti di turno qui sono tranquilli.

translation.en: So they'll run day room, like, once or twice throughout the day.
translation.it: Ci lasciano uscire anche una, due volte al giorno.

translation.en: [inmate] Oh, shit!
-[inmate] Good coffee? -Yeah. Thank you.
translation.it: - È buono il caffè? - Sì. Grazie.

translation.en: The things we do in jail.
Are you getting in the shower?
translation.it: - Vai a fare la doccia? - Sì.

translation.en: [Shawn] I'm in the shower after you, bruh.
[Shawn] I've been here for almost 90 days
and I'm finally getting out of here.
Just the anticipation of knowing that I'm going to be free
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di tornare in libertà,

translation.en: and be able to walk around, go get food when I want to,
use the bathroom without having people around me and it smelling like boo boo.
translation.it: andare al bagno da sola, senza quella puzza.

translation.en: Teddy, what you got in that bag?
Did you come in with some dope?
Yeah, I got you a doodoo, baby, I got you.
translation.it: Non ho un bel niente per te.

translation.en: -You do? -I got you a doodoo.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Certo. Ora te lo porto.

translation.en: I sure do need it. [chuckles]
I am a convicted armed robber with two strikes.
translation.it: Ero condannata per rapina e ora ho due accuse.

translation.en: Last time I was here, I did 45 days and then this time I'm doing 90 days.
translation.it: Mi sono già fatta 45 giorni e stavolta sono 90.

translation.en: Being in jail sometimes can get easy for me.
translation.it: A volte, la vita qui dentro è facile per me.

translation.en: Is your tongue split? Can you go like this?
translation.it: Mi fai vedere la lingua biforcuta?

translation.en: I get along good with girls because of the way that I look.
translation.it: Vado d'accordo con le ragazze per via del mio aspetto.

translation.en: I guess it's my flirtatious personality.
Okay, I want to get my ears gauged. Does it hurt?
Hella ratchet.
Hey, I like it.
There's always somebody that wants to do something,
translation.it: Si fanno tutte in quattro per me.

translation.en: that wants to cook for me, that wants to give me things.
You can use my phone time, it's good.
I can use your phone time?
But I'm married.
Even though I'm a big flirt,
I don't want nobody else but my wife.
translation.it: ma ho in testa solo mia moglie.

translation.en: And so I'm gonna keep my spit in my mouth and my hands to myself.
translation.it: Perciò, terrò la bocca chiusa e le mani a posto.

translation.en: [unintelligible yelling] Let me play with your ear! Ah!
Which is going to be...
Yeah, I'ma stay to myself.
Thank you. You are a gem. You just saved my life.
translation.it: Grazie. Sei un tesoro. Mi hai salvata.

translation.en: Girl, I was supposed to be outta here four days ago.
-Really? -Yes.
Crazy.
[Shawn] It started off when I was young.
My first robbery...
It was kinda funny, 'cause we were watching--
I was at the movies.
And I was with my ex girlfriend.
We were watching one of those shoot 'em up bang-bang movies.
We were carrying knives.
And I kinda just hinted around like, "We should rob these girls behind us."
translation.it: Per gioco, dissi: "Rapiniamo le ragazze dietro di noi".

translation.en: So, at the end of the movie, she was like, "You ready?" I was like, "For what?"
translation.it: Alla fine del film, lei fa: "Pronta?" E io: "Per cosa?"

translation.en: She was like, "To go rob these girls." And I was like, "You're serious?"
And I'll never forget,
she asked one of the girls, "Can I have some change?"
translation.it: Chiese a una di loro: "Avete monete da cambiare?"

translation.en: And the girl was like, "Yeah, sure. How much you need?"
translation.it: E la ragazza: "Certo. Quanto ti serve?"

translation.en: She was like, "Matter of fact, can I have your whole purse?"
translation.it: E lei: "Anzi, dammi tutta la borsa".

translation.en: So, we pulled out the knives...
and we took their purse,
and it was the most pointless thing that I've ever done.
translation.it: Mai fatta una cosa più insensata.

translation.en: We didn't get no money from it.
And it kinda started a chain of events that just spiraled out of control.
translation.it: Da lì, si è scatenata una serie di eventi incontrollabili.

translation.en: -You wanna play? -I don't know how to play.
-You know how to play? -Uh-huh.
[Shawn] Do you wanna...
...buy some pills?
- Buy some what? - Pills
-The pills? -Do you want to?
Oh. Like what?
Um... noo-noos?
Or na-nas.
What's noo-noos or na-nas?
Neuron?
Okay, hold on.
Some black?
Oh! Hell no, not that.
Explain to her what a na-na make you feel like.
translation.it: Spiegale l'effetto che ti fa una na-na.

translation.en: Makes you feel like you smoked a blunt.
Oh, no. I'm good.
-I don't like it. -But in a good way.
There's like microphones over my head.
This was just a drill.
Everybody says that I'm a monster, but looks can be deceiving.
translation.it: Mi credono un mostro, ma l'apparenza inganna.

translation.en: I've got almost half my body covered in tattoos.
translation.it: Ho tatuaggi su tutto il corpo.

translation.en: I kind of have, like, my good and innocent side and then my monster side.
translation.it: Ho un lato da innocente e uno da mostro.

translation.en: Girl, you know you want this dick.
I'm from the east coast.
So, I grew up over there.
I was living in New York.
I was happy.
I had my own place. I was running a business on 5th Avenue.
translation.it: Avevo una casa, un'attività sulla Quinta Strada.

translation.en: I was doing tattoo conventions.
Then side money would be, like, hustling and selling drugs.
translation.it: Ma arrotondavo con attività losche e spacciando droga.

translation.en: I got locked up on the east coast. I did three months over there,
translation.it: Mi hanno arrestata. Mi sono fatta tre mesi lì.

translation.en: then once I got released, I came over here,
and I've been mainly in the streets, just hustling and doing that whole thing.
translation.it: E ho ricominciato la brutta vita di prima.

translation.en: My charges originally were possession of a stolen vehicle, GTA,
translation.it: All'inizio, le mie accuse erano furto d'auto,

translation.en: transportation of narcotics,
13 pounds of weed, 65 grams of meth,
translation.it: sei chili d'erba, 65 grammi di meth,

translation.en: fictitious checks, and catching felonies while out on bail.
translation.it: assegni falsi e violazione della libertà vigilata.

translation.en: It took me
getting locked up to, like, look at my life
translation.it: ...di finire qui per fermarmi un attimo

translation.en: and be like, "Okay, you're fucking up, you're fucking up.
translation.it: e dire: "Stai mandando tutto a puttane.

translation.en: What are you doing that got you in here?
translation.it: Cosa hai fatto per finire qui?

translation.en: What's the real reason I'm in here? Or, you know, how am I treating people?"
translation.it: Perché sei dentro? Stai trattando male le persone."

translation.en: [producer] Well, and frankly, you're also committing crimes.
translation.it: E poi, hai commesso dei reati.

translation.en: Well, yes, I mean, that too, but... [chuckles]
Hi, I need to bail myself out.
Given my experience,
it is unusual for a first-time offender to come into custody
translation.it: è raro vedere un incensurato finire in custodia

translation.en: with as serious of charges as she has.
translation.it: con accuse gravi come le sue.

translation.en: Miss Sundermeyer's bail is set at $100,000.
translation.it: La sua cauzione è fissata a 100.000 dollari.

translation.en: If she does not post bail, she will be here until her arraignment.
translation.it: Se non paga, resterà qui fino alla citazione in giudizio.

translation.en: [bail bondsman] Okay. How much is your bail?
I can't hear what you're saying.
One hundred thousand.
One hundred thousand?
Okay. What did you get arrested for?
translation.it: Ok. Per cosa ti hanno arrestata?

translation.en: I got arrested for carjacking.
translation.it: Mi hanno arrestata per furto d'auto.

translation.en: Okay, how much money do you have for bail?
translation.it: Ok. Quanti soldi hai a disposizione?

translation.en: How much is it to do a payment plan?
translation.it: Si può fare un pagamento a rate?

translation.en: I can do--
I don't even know who you are.
Okay, my name is--
You won't give me how much money you have.
You're just bullshit. You hear that? [phone line beeps]
I'm bullshit?
What the fuck?
I'm bullshit, I guess. I'm just bullshit.
Hi, I need to bail myself out. It's for a $100,000 bail.
translation.it: Salve. Mi servono 100.000 dollari per la cauzione.

translation.en: Eight thousand?
How much can we do for a payment plan?
-[unintelligible] -You can't do any less than that?
I can do, like, $500.
I don't know. I just wanna go home.
translation.it: Non lo so. Vorrei solo andare a casa.

translation.en: [sobbing] I'm not going to see my baby.
[Yasmin] I'm not a mean person.
I want to be a veterinarian, like...
I want to be back to how it was before, going to school,
translation.it: Voglio tornare ai tempi della scuola,

translation.en: when I was happy, seeing my baby happy.
translation.it: quando ero felice col mio piccolo.

translation.en: Like, that just all made me happy.
I was supposed to be at work today at seven...
or something. I don't know. I just...
translation.it: ...o giù di lì. Non lo so. Io...

translation.en: I need to stop.
I just wanna be happy.
I always do this to myself.
I'll have everything, you know, being good,
translation.it: Potrei avere tutto, se facessi la brava,

translation.en: instead I just ruin it.
[Shawn] I get to go! I'm so excited.
So now I'm just waiting to get released.
They'll probably release you after dinner.
[chuckles] Oh, my God. I'm going back to sleep.
I'm not gonna be able to sleep. Hope they give us day room.
translation.it: Non potrei. Spero nella sala comune.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't see how you'll be able to sleep. [chuckles]
I'm ready to go. I can't believe it.
translation.it: Voglio uscire. Non ci posso credere.

translation.en: Look, man...
This is my old bunkie. Like, I love her. I love her so much.
translation.it: È la mia vecchia compagna di cella. Le voglio bene.

translation.en: You guys always find a way back to each other.
It's precious.
I feel like-- I keep fighting a lot, huh? And don't realize it.
translation.it: Litigo sempre con tutti e non me ne rendo conto.

translation.en: Yeah, you do.
-I thought I fought a lot. -That part, though.
People don't fuck with me no more.
I got into four fights already.
Some people call me sweet, some people call me mean. Like...
translation.it: C'è chi mi crede buona, chi cattiva, ma...

translation.en: I am who I am.
I'm a...
nice ass real bitch.
I love this lady right here.
She is so crazy.
I can honestly sit here and say, like, I trust her with my life.
translation.it: Sarò sincera, mi fido ciecamente di lei.

translation.en: Wouldn't want to be anyone else's bunkie.
[Noonie] She's my lighter to a cigarette, like...
Like that, you know? Like...
We go together, so...
-[Monster] Love you, Noonie! -We're just...
I love you, too, Monster.
I'm in here for pimping and pandering.
Um, my bail is $1,000,000.
I've been here for a year-- Thirteen months, actually.
I had a pretty decent childhood.
I mean, I was in and out of foster care.
Everybody dreams of being a lawyer and a doctor,
translation.it: Tutti sognavano di fare il medico.

translation.en: but I wanted to be a social worker, because I was in and out of the system.
translation.it: Io volevo fare l'assistente sociale, perché conoscevo quel mondo.

translation.en: I'ma go back to school when I get out, go to college, you know.
translation.it: Uscita di qui, tornerò a studiare al college.

translation.en: I'm not really trippin'.
Noham.
Hey, you on the end. Your feet that way.
Two more fingers. We have two more fingers.
[male officer] File in.
I am getting her jail clothing ready.
translation.it: Sto preparando la sua divisa da detenuta.

translation.en: She said she's not gonna bail out and she'd like to go upstairs.
translation.it: Non pagherà la cauzione e vuole andare di sopra.

translation.en: So, this is the jail rolls.
translation.it: Questa è la dotazione del carcere.

translation.en: Jail shoes.
Our jail underwear and bra.
So, sometimes we have brand new ones, and then sometimes...
translation.it: A volte, la biancheria è nuova, mentre altre...

translation.en: they look like this.
Pull that door.
So, I'm going to need you to get fully undressed.
Put all your clothing in this clear plastic bag.
translation.it: Metti i tuoi vestiti in questo sacchetto.

translation.en: Okay. Completely naked. Socks, shoes, everything.
translation.it: Ok. Togli tutto. Calze, scarpe, tutto.

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you.
All right, now turn, face me.
translation.it: Ora stai di fronte a me.

translation.en: Stand on those yellow footprints.
Bend forward at the waist.
Reach behind you from behind with both hands,
translation.it: Braccia lungo la schiena. Da dietro, con le mani,

translation.en: spread yourself open, cough hard three times.
translation.it: allarga le natiche e tossisci tre volte.

translation.en: You have to get your fingers closer to your vagina,
spread yourself open, cough hard three times.
Okay.
Here's your clothing. Get dressed.
And then come on out. Stand right here and face the wall.
translation.it: Ora mettiti in piedi lì, faccia al muro.

translation.en: Hands are considered weapons in this facility,
so make sure they're in the front waistband of your pants
whenever you're walking by any kind of staff.
translation.it: se passi accanto a un agente.

translation.en: Seven East from female booking. One en route, escorted.
We're heading this way, to your right.
[Salazar] Let's walk up these stairs.
[inmate] We don't want you!
That's my friend.
[Yasmin] I have a question. This cell is dirty.
translation.it: Ho una domanda. La cella è sporca.

translation.en: Can I get a clean cell?
No, you can't get a different cell.
But I just want one that was wiped off.
translation.it: Ne voglio solo una più pulita.

translation.en: Yeah, it was.
Our workers cleaned. There's nothing on the ground.
translation.it: È stata pulita. Non è sporca.

translation.en: [man] Okay, yuck it up, ass-jackal. You're on camera.
[Wolverine] Being on the Trustee floor is so different.
Bro, we've got it made here, bro.
We get food, we get our own cell,
we get TVs, we get...
phones all day.
We can sit in the hallway and look at all the women.
translation.it: Possiamo star a guardare le donne.

translation.en: -All day! -All day long.
I see you!
She was screaming last time.
[man] We're called workers, or trustees.
We all have to wear these white shirts.
You know, you have to get classified and go through a certain criteria
to be eligible to work down here.
We work our asses off down here.
translation.it: E ci spacchiamo il culo qui.

translation.en: [Wolverine] What's up, pimp?
High-five! High-five!
Ha, gotcha! [chuckles]
Oh, my God.
[Wolverine] What's up with you, girl?
I'm doing all right.
Just slip on through.
Yeah.
Funny thing, you making friends always everywhere we go.
Hey, what do you want me to do?
I'm a friendly guy, you know?
[Wolverine] We're going to seven where all his fans are.
translation.it: Andiamo al settimo dalle sue fan.

translation.en: [man] Oh, yeah!
All the girls are gonna be, "Oh! Wolverine!"
[man] Happens every time.
Look at him.
He has the chops, the hair. That's his hero.
translation.it: Ha la barba, i capelli. È il suo eroe.

translation.en: [Wolverine] When I was in prison about eight years ago,
translation.it: Otto anni fa, in una prigione statale,

translation.en: we didn't have access to mirrors and razors, but maybe once a month,
translation.it: ci davano specchio e rasoio solo una volta al mese.

translation.en: so I just kinda cut it,
and then there were telling me, "You look like Wolverine,"
translation.it: Tutti mi dissero che somigliavo a Wolverine

translation.en: so I kinda went with it. Gives me strength, you know?
translation.it: e l'ho tenuta così. Mi dà forza, capito?

translation.en: Be something strong, you know what I mean?
Hopefully it's my last trip here. Been here a lot of times.
I'm trying to find some help when I get out there,
so I don't end up back here, at the same spot.
[chuckles] What's up?
Generally, we're not allowed to communicate with the females.
translation.it: Non possiamo comunicare con le donne,

translation.en: Sometimes we cross paths.
What's up, girl? What's happening? You know what I mean?
translation.it: Come stai? Che ti prende? Fammi capire.

translation.en: They come up and they ask me to sign my poster, all that.
I can't do that.
I love cupcakes.
I got cupcakes. I mean...
translation.it: - Ho notato il sedere. - Guarda. Insomma...

translation.en: [Becky] Well, those are not very fluffy.
What's wrong with them? They're fluffy.
[Becky] More squats.
More squats? Oh!
That's out.
Right? [male officer] What are you doing on this floor?
translation.it: - No? - Che ci fai a questo piano?

translation.en: [Wolverine] I don't want to get fired.
Bye, Becky.
-[man] I knew you'd get us in trouble. -[Wolverine chuckles]
[Rowland] Those male workers should not have been talking to those female workers.
translation.it: Gli operai non dovevano parlare con quelle donne.

translation.en: [male officer] I guess that's why they don't call them trustees any more, right?
translation.it: Sarà per questo che non li chiamiamo più fiduciari.

translation.en: Yeah. Understatement.
[male officer] They call 'em workers.
You know, what's crazy is you go to eighth floor,
translation.it: Lo sai, c'è un problema all'ottavo piano,

translation.en: where a lot of your...
shot callers are,
and if those guys have clout enough to get dope through the workers,
translation.it: Riescono a far trasportare la droga agli operai.

translation.en: it just comes straight from the eighth floor, the top floor,
translation.it: E così se la passano dall'ottavo piano

translation.en: all the way down.
At first I thought it was an issue on seven and eight,
translation.it: Pensavo fosse solo tra settimo e ottavo,

translation.en: but then you're finding it on...
-all the floors. -Yeah.
A lot of the girls here have ties
translation.it: Molte donne operaie qui hanno legami

translation.en: with some of their male inmate counterparts,
and I just see a lot of them putting themselves in stupid positions
translation.it: e ne vedo tante mettersi in posizioni rischiose

translation.en: they don't need to put themselves in.
That's why we gotta keep hitting cells.
-Yeah. -Maybe they'll get the hint not to...
float dope through.
Yeah.
Make your way to your rooms. Let's go.
[Shayna] Girl, cut that shit.
[Tayler] Cut that shit up.
The fuckin' boys moved everything.
translation.it: Gli operai maschi hanno spostato tutto.

translation.en: I dunno where anything's at.
Bunch of assholes.
[Shayna] Shayna Wimberly.
I'm Tayler Coatney.
And we work night shift together.
We do chore time and clean up after the girls.
We're supposed to be role models. Sometimes, we kind of...
translation.it: Dovremmo dare l'esempio, ma a volte...

translation.en: We get a little out of hand, but we have fun with it.
translation.it: Siamo disordinate, ma è uno spasso.

translation.en: -[Tayler] I want to hit you with it. -[Shayna] Yeah, I know.
[Shayna] You get more freedom being a worker.
We can go into other pods.
We can shower, use the phone.
[Tayler] My door's always popped. Like, all day is day room.
translation.it: Esco in sala comune quando voglio.

translation.en: It's nice.
[Shayna] This girl just came into booking.
[Tayler] Where is she? At 28?
[Shayna] Is that her?
[Tayler] Hi.
-[Yasmin] Hello. -What's your name?
Yasmin? That's a pretty name.
Thank you.
-[Yasmin] What's your name? -Tayler.
-Nice to meet you. -I'm Shayna.
[Shayna] We overheard that some girl came in here with a Sawzall blade
translation.it: Sapevamo che una ragazza era entrata con un seghetto,

translation.en: and a fully loaded pipe and a lighter
translation.it: una pipa carica e un accendino

translation.en: -inside of her. -Yeah, like, she--
Shoved in her, you know, nani.
So, we were-- I was like...
-[chuckles] It was so bad! -She had a hospital band on,
and she, like...
I'm like, "She's walking kinda funny. Maybe that was her, you know."
-[both laugh] -[Tayler] I really thought that was her!
But I mean, like, she's not like that at all.
translation.it: Ma lei non è il tipo da fare certe cose.

translation.en: She looks super innocent, you know?
If you don't mind us asking, what are you in here for?
Carjacking.
-[Tayler] That's no fun. How old are you? -I'm 19.
translation.it: - Brutto. Quanti anni hai? - Ne ho 19.

translation.en: [Tayler] Nineteen? Me, too!
[Yasmin] I'm facing five felonies.
[Shayna] She said carjacking. She made it up.
translation.it: Non è solo un furto d'auto allora.

translation.en: There's "carjacking, assault with deadly weapon on peace officer,
translation.it: Furto d'auto, aggressione armata a pubblico ufficiale

translation.en: receiving known stolen motor vehicle,
reckless driving, alcohol and drugs."
Oh, my.
Well, she was on a good one, right?
What time do we come out?
[Tayler] Day room is really whenever they feel like offering it.
Try to use the phone and try to get a shower in,
translation.it: Usa il telefono e la doccia.

translation.en: 'cause you don't know when your next one's gonna be.
translation.it: Non sai quando uscirai di nuovo.

translation.en: Yeah.
-[Yasmin] I wanna see my mom. -[Shayna] It's going to be okay, okay?
translation.it: - Voglio vedere mia madre. - Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: You'll get through this.
I'm not gonna lie to you, it's not gonna be easy, but...
translation.it: Sarò sincera. Non sarà facile, ma...

translation.en: you'll be okay.
We will see you in a little bit. Okay?
-We'll come check on you, okay? -Try to take it easy.
translation.it: - A vedere come stai. - Non agitarti.

translation.en: [Tayler] She was like...
evading and like, assault with a deadly weapon?
Look at her!
-She's going to be here a minute. -[Tayler] Yeah.
translation.it: - Resterà qui per un po'. - Sì.

translation.en: She'll probably be fighting her case for a couple months.
translation.it: Vedrà il giudice tra qualche mese.

translation.en: [Shayna] I mean, I thought I would be fighting mine for a couple months.
I've been here ten months.
I don't even know how many days I have.
I might have forever. I might leave tomorrow. I don't know.
translation.it: Potrei restare per sempre, uscire domani.

translation.en: I'll be here...
I don't know how long.
Long time. I don't even count no more.
I'm just trying to, trying to wiggle the numbers around
translation.it: Faccio ordine fra i numeri nella mia testa.

translation.en: and see what I can do with it.
My max was nine years,
translation.it: La mia sentenza massima era di nove anni.

translation.en: and doubled, since I'm a striker.
He wanted to do four years doubled, which means eight years.
translation.it: Voleva darmi quattro anni per due, cioè otto.

translation.en: With the seven years and 85%,
I've already been two years flat.
translation.it: ma ne ho già fatti due.

translation.en: I have to do a 90-day commitment first,
and then consecutive 150 days with half.
translation.it: e una consecutiva di 150 giorni con dimezzamento.

translation.en: That offer came down to 16 months doubled.
Eighty-five percent of seven would be, like, five years, eight months.
translation.it: L'85 per cento di sette è tipo cinque anni e otto mesi.

translation.en: And then two years on top of that that'd be like three years, eight months.
translation.it: Tolti due anni, mi restano tre anni e otto mesi.

translation.en: Which means 32 months.
Once I get there, they'll knock off 16 months.
translation.it: A inizio pena, mi toglieranno 16 mesi.

translation.en: And then 85% hopefully will go down to 66%
when I get over the wall in prison.
I have four months already in,
which doubles to eight months, so I would have eight months left.
translation.it: Raddoppiati, sono otto. Ne restano altri otto.

translation.en: It would just be way lower than that.
I'd probably have two years left to do.
So...
-[producer] I'm a little confused. -[inmate laughs]
So I'm fucked.
Yeah. Don't go to jail. [chuckles]
[male officer] Chow-time, chow-time, chow-time.
Pop your doors. Come out and grab one tray
and return to your cell. Do not try to grab an extra tray for yourself.
translation.it: e tornate in cella. Un solo vassoio.

translation.en: That's a long-ass line!
Whatcha want me to do? Push these bitches out the way?
See this nasty-ass food?
Fake-ass chicken strips.
This some beans. Nasty-ass carrots.
translation.it: E questi che sono? Fagioli? Carote?

translation.en: [Monster] That's called, "I'm hungry."
I don't know if I'm doing this pruno right, but... [inhales]
translation.it: Non so se sto facendo bene questo pruno.

translation.en: It's really just oranges and pineapples, but...
translation.it: Io ci metto arance e ananas, ma...

translation.en: we probably won't get no more pineapples.
[Monster] Pruno is alcohol.
It's usually made with fruit.
[Noonie] I always make the best mother-fucking drink.
translation.it: Il mio pruno è il migliore qui.

translation.en: It's not infrequent for us to find pruno,
translation.it: Ci capita spesso di trovare il pruno

translation.en: as far as cell searches and shakedowns are concerned.
We'll obviously confiscate it.
It's one of the easiest things to make in jail,
translation.it: È facile da fare in carcere.

translation.en: as long as you have some form of a sugary substance,
access to fruit, which we give them on a daily basis
translation.it: come la frutta, che i detenuti ricevono ogni giorno,

translation.en: and warm water, which they also have access to.
translation.it: e acqua calda, a cui hanno sempre accesso.

translation.en: You put it in a bag, wait for like a week or so...
translation.it: Riempi un sacchetto e aspetti una settimana.

translation.en: You gotta burp it when the bag blows up.
translation.it: Lo fai sfiatare quando si gonfia.

translation.en: Then it's done.
[Drea] Whatcha doing in there, girl?
-Bitch there's nothing but food in here. -[laughter]
[Noonie] Leave me alone.
Better, like, talking to my fucking self.
[Drea] Okay.
All right!
I don't fuck with Drea.
I'm here for burglary.
translation.it: Sono qui per furto con scasso.

translation.en: Jail gets a little boring, so I like to entertain myself
translation.it: Qui dentro ci si annoia. A me, piace svagarmi

translation.en: and my way of doing that is with females.
[Drea] I have a lot of females in here that do want to be with me.
translation.it: Ci sono tante ragazze qui che mi vengono dietro.

translation.en: There's kinda a lot of ducks in here.
There's not really too many pretty people right now.
translation.it: Ce ne sono poche di carine.

translation.en: I'm not gonna waste my time with no ducks.
translation.it: Non perdo tempo con i cessi.

translation.en: Unless they're profitable.
If they got something for me, commissary or something. I don't know.
translation.it: Tipo quando mi regalano beni dello spaccio.

translation.en: You've got straight bitches, bisexual bitches,
translation.it: Ci sono le etero, le bisessuali

translation.en: and then you got bi-choosy bitches.
Wait, you're telling me I'm choosy?
There's always drama behind Drea.
She wants attention whether it be negative or positive.
translation.it: Vuole le attenzioni, positive o negative.

translation.en: She's an agitator.
If she causes an argument with somebody, it gets our day room shut down.
translation.it: Quando scatena un litigio, ci fanno tornare in cella.

translation.en: [male officer on PA] O-rec! Go to O-rec. Again, O-rec, go to O-rec.
translation.it: Ora d'aria! Potete uscire in cortile.

translation.en: [inmate] Come on, you don't need to be on TV. [inmate 2] I know
I'm finna watch.
-[woman 2] Hey, girl! -[woman 1] Whatcha doing?
She's tryin to get at me, girl. Gotta get the good view.
translation.it: Vogliono me. Mi metto in mostra.

translation.en: [inmate] Look at these thirsty-ass thots.
[woman 2] Oh, hell no! I'm gonna be on.
It's hard to hear them. They're so far down there.
[woman 1] It's heavy. I can tell.
Yes.
[male officer on PA] All right, ladies, outdoor rec is over.
Please return to your cells.
[Rowland] Ladies!
Why are we screwing up already?
Quiet!
We could have easily put you guys on lockdown
for that little stint you guys pulled in outdoor rec.
translation.it: per quello scherzetto in ora d'aria.

translation.en: -[unintelligible protest] -Hold on!
There were a group of people screaming at people on the streets
translation.it: Alcune di voi hanno gridato a delle persone in strada.

translation.en: and it caught someone's attention outside.
[inmate] Yes, we understand. We apologize.
Which one apologizes?
[inmate] It was an old man,
and I couldn't tell if he was my lawyer.
There are many old men walking the streets of downtown Sacramento.
translation.it: Ci sono tanti uomini in centro a Sacramento.

translation.en: I highly doubt that was your attorney in particular.
translation.it: Dubito fosse proprio il tuo avvocato.

translation.en: All right!
If you guys have questions, I will answer them as I do the next cell check.
translation.it: Se avete domande, vi risponderò durante il controllo celle.

translation.en: [male officer on PA] Into your cells for lockdown.
translation.it: Tutte in cella per il coprifuoco.

translation.en: -[male officer on PA] Hey, Beason. -[Shawn] Yes?
Beason, roll up your stuff. You're getting released.
translation.it: Raccogli la tua roba. Esci adesso.

translation.en: -Okay, I'm rolled up. -[cellmate] Amen!
-[cellmate] Bye, girl! -[Shawn] Bye.
-[cellmate] Good luck! -[Shawn] Thank you.
[cellmate] Don't forget.
[Shawn] Yeah, they just let me go.
I'll try not to.
Alright, head on down towards the elevator for me, please.
Thank you. There you go.
Let a real one free.
[male officer] All right. There you go.
[Shawn] I don't want to do this forever.
It's time for me to grow up.
I want to go back to school.
I'm willing to, you know, work hard,
I guess, for money.
And not just take it.
Hey, babe!
I'm in the release tank. You here to pick me up?
translation.it: Sto per uscire. Sei venuta a prendermi?

translation.en: [Christine] I'm here.
-Are you going to be in the same spot? -Yeah.
Okay, I'll see you in a minute. Okay?
All right.
[Shawn] My wife, I know that she loves me.
translation.it: Mia moglie mi ama, lo so.

translation.en: She's there for me as much as she can right now, but it's tough for her.
translation.it: Mi è sempre stata accanto, ma è dura per lei.

translation.en: Every time I go to jail, it seems like it's longer and longer each time I go back.
translation.it: Ogni volta che entro qui, sembra passare un'eternità.

translation.en: Come on. My ride is waiting.
We're a team, and when a piece of the team is gone, it just makes it hard.
translation.it: Siamo una squadra e, quando manca un componente, è dura.

translation.en: -Is there a Ms. Beason? -Yes.
Go ahead and step out right here.
Right around this way. Follow that yellow line down.
translation.it: Di qua. Segui la linea gialla.

translation.en: Yes.
Stop right there.
Face the wall.
Officer?
Why am I going in here?
Still in the process of processing your release.
translation.it: La scarcerazione non è ancora definitiva.

translation.en: Your parole officer decided they wanted to place a hold.
So you're not gonna be going home at this time until your parole officer...
translation.it: Non puoi uscire, finché l'agente di custodia...

translation.en: takes care of all that.
[Shawn] Shit.
Oh, my gosh, this is crazy.
[Hernandez] When I first was assigned to the Intel and Classification Unit,
translation.it: Quando mi assegnarono all'Unità di Indagine e Classificazione,

translation.en: everybody had a theme to their desk.
translation.it: c'era un tema per ogni scrivania.

translation.en: A football theme, puppies theme, and then they asked me,
"What is your theme going to be?"
And I thought it was a joke.
So I said, "I don't know, unicorns farting out rainbows?"
translation.it: Così, dissi: "Non lo so, unicorni che scoreggiano arcobaleni?"

translation.en: Well, they decided to decorate my cubicle.
translation.it: Così, mi hanno addobbato la postazione.

translation.en: So I just kept the theme and now we got it going.
translation.it: Ora ho accettato il tema e lo porto avanti.

translation.en: It was at one point a really blowed-up unicorn
translation.it: Questo unicorno era bello gonfio una volta.

translation.en: and it had Skittles coming out of the mouth.
We have to do our best in our facilities to ensure that everybody is safe.
translation.it: Il nostro lavoro è assicurarci che tutti siano al sicuro qui dentro.

translation.en: It's in human nature for...
especially inmates here to break rules and violate rules.
translation.it: ...specie per un detenuto, infrangere le regole.

translation.en: We can't catch everything, but it happens.
translation.it: Non deve sfuggirci niente, ma capita.

translation.en: [Hernandez] Girls, get fully dressed.
Hawkins, control.
Jones, I need you in the classroom now.
translation.it: Vi voglio entrambe in aula, ora.

translation.en: -[Monster] What the fuck? -[Noonie] Why?
Get fully dressed.
[Monster] All right, we coming.
That hella fucked up, man.
translation.it: Che cazzo di storia è questa?

translation.en: Because we have approximately 135 inmates that are booked daily,
translation.it: Avendo una media di 135 nuovi ingressi al giorno,

translation.en: we try to conduct shakedowns as often as we can.
And sometimes, we can get tips from other inmates.
translation.it: A volte, riceviamo soffiate da altre detenute.

translation.en: They'll let us know, "Hey, something's going on in this cell."
Do you want to go through this side and I'll go through this side.
translation.it: Tu controlla questo lato e io controllo questo.

translation.en: Don't know why she has all this.
[Rowland] Table's clear.
[Noonie] Somebody snitched on me.
So, they raided my room.
translation.it: Così, mi hanno perquisito la cella.

translation.en: They always like to throw around my shit.
It was like a handful of people that knew I had pruno, so...
translation.it: Erano in poche a sapere che avevo fatto il pruno, perciò...

translation.en: bitches was hating.
[Rowland] This bag's clear.
We got some joy juice.
Some pruno.
[female officer] Oh, nice.
I'm hella mad, 'cause they probably found my pruno.
translation.it: Sono furiosa. Avranno trovato il pruno.

translation.en: [Rowland] Kickstart our Friday.
[female officer] Happy Friday.
I have disciplinary hearings
for Hawkins and Jones out of 118.
[Hernandez] Hi, Hawkins.
Sgt. Hernandez, I'm here to do your hearing.
translation.it: - Sergente Hernandez, per la tua udienza. - Ok.

translation.en: Hi, Jones. How are you?
Tired. I wanna go back to sleep.
[Hernandez] And I'm tired, too.
So apparently, some officers did some shakedowns
translation.it: Le agenti hanno condotto una perquisizione.

translation.en: and they found a plastic bag, odor of an alcoholic beverage,
translation.it: Hanno trovato un sacchetto, odore di alcolici

translation.en: and they found pruno in your cell.
translation.it: e del pruno nella vostra cella.

translation.en: I mean, it's just...
I don't know whose it is.
There's no way it was a gallon and a half.
translation.it: È impossibile che fossero sei litri.

translation.en: How much do you think it was? Maybe a couple cups?
So you're pleading guilty or not guilty?
I plead the fifth.
[Hernandez] This is just basically in-house rules.
You're not gonna get extra charges if that's what you think.
translation.it: Non avrai altre accuse, se temi questo.

translation.en: -Penal Code charges. -[Monster] I'm gonna say I'm not guilty,
because it's not... I don't know whose it is.
translation.it: perché non so di chi sia.

translation.en: Was it good stuff?
Did you make it?
-No. -Did you even taste test it?
[Noonie] No. I wish I did.
So are you saying this is your stuff that was in here?
translation.it: Stai dicendo che l'alcol è tuo?

translation.en: No, I'm not saying that.
So whose pruno was it?
-Miraculously-- -I don't even know how to make pruno.
translation.it: - È apparso-- - Non so come fare il pruno.

translation.en: And you were just waiting to drink it.
So, some magical unicorn came into your cell
translation.it: Quindi, un fantasma è entrato nella vostra cella

translation.en: and put this whole bag of pruno inside your cell.
Is that what you're telling me?
I appreciate you saying that you were ready to drink
translation.it: Apprezzo che tu abbia ammesso di volerlo bere

translation.en: and you knew it was in, acknowledged that it was in your cell.
translation.it: e di sapere che fosse nella vostra cella.

translation.en: I'm going to find you guilty, even though you plead not guilty.
translation.it: Ti dichiaro colpevole, contro la tua dichiarazione.

translation.en: You're going to get the max of 15 days.
Do you know what it means to be on restriction? Have you been?
translation.it: Sai cos'è la restrizione? L'hai mai subita?

translation.en: I can't come out in day room.
Yeah, no day room,
you get a disciplinary shower every other day.
You're allowed to have legal mail and make legal phone calls,
translation.it: potrai comunicare solo col tuo avvocato

translation.en: and that is it.
Do you have any questions?
All right, go ahead and check back in and head back.
translation.it: Ok, puoi tornare nella tua cella.

translation.en: [Shawn] This is crazy.
Hi, I'm not getting released.
[Christine] What?
[Shawn] My parole officer put a parole hold on me.
I'm sorry, Christine.
This time I came to jail, it's been a struggle on me and my wife.
translation.it: Questa volta è stata più dura del solito.

translation.en: She isn't working, and she's doing the best that she can.
translation.it: Mia moglie non sta lavorando, ma fa del suo meglio.

translation.en: Do you love me?
Yes.
Would you be able to do me a favor?
Could you send me some money?
Wow, are you serious right now?
Yes.
I don't have any. You need to grow up.
Now I gotta get back dressed into oranges.
[female officer] You're going to get completely undressed. Put everything in this bag.
translation.it: Togliti i vestiti e mettili qui dentro.

translation.en: Okay?
[inmate] Shawn? I thought you were leaving.
[Shawn] Bro, I'll tell you later.
[inmate] Okay.
I really did wanna drink that shit.
Probably would've been good right now.
I wouldn't admit to it
even if I did or didn't make it.
I'm not gonna admit to that.
I'm not gonna incriminate myself or anybody
um, in that matter.
I think she shoulda got ten days.
I think I should have gotten nothing, but--
Or, that's true.
Somebody...
definitely opened their mouth.
It's... wrong.
There's no need for somebody else to put their nose in anybody else's business.
translation.it: La gente non dovrebbe ficcare il naso negli affari degli altri.

translation.en: [Monster] It's not really hard to figure out
who's talking.
Especially in here.
We have nothing but time to sit and listen
and observe.
No, they hit our room because somebody...
-Opened their mouth. -Yes.
[Monster] Whose?
You know?
It's the one who wouldn't drink it last time.
translation.it: È stata quella che non beve.

translation.en: The one who didn't want it.
[Monster] That bitch, right?
Okay, okay.
If you snitch, then you're going to get to meet my fist.
translation.it: Se fai la spia, assaggerai i miei pugni.

translation.en: You're fucking with my freedom.
And...
I know I fucked with my freedom by getting myself here.
translation.it: ...me la sono già fottuta da sola.

translation.en: I don't need nobody else do it for me.
[inmate] We love you Monster and Noonie!
[Noonie] Bitches is crazy.
I love it.
"Monster and Noonie, we love you!"
[yelling] Team Monster Gang! Yeah, yeah!
-[yells] Noonie Squad! -[both] Yeah, yeah!
[Monster] We need to let the whole jail know,
translation.it: Dobbiamo informare tutti, fino all'ultimo piano.

translation.en: let the guys know upstairs, knock on the bowl.
translation.it: Dobbiamo informare tutti, fino all'ultimo piano. Busso sul cesso.

translation.en: Hello?
Hello!
Yo, Andrea Gunderson is a mother-fucking snitch
translation.it: Andrea Gunderson è una spiona del cazzo.

translation.en: and everybody needs to know.
Do what?
[male inmate] Let that bitch know snitching is a no-no.
translation.it: Ditele che le spie finiscono male.

translation.en: Yeah, that bitch snitching is a scaredy-ass bitch.
translation.it: Quella stronza è una fifona del cazzo.

translation.en: You feel me? She's in her fucking cell--
-[male inmate] What cell is she in though? -She in 28.
[male inmate] It's always good to know about people like that
cause snitching is a no-no.
Snitching is a no-no, okay?
Fuck these snitches, man!
Yeah, I be talking on the toilet.
It's fun. It's better talking to the boys
translation.it: È forte. Meglio parlare coi ragazzi

translation.en: than these raggedy-ass girls all the time.
translation.it: che con le straccione di qua.

translation.en: Hey, bruh.
-Hello? -Hello!
-Hello? -Who's this?
What are you doing?
I had just got here from juvenile hall
and so, I didn't know anything about toilet talking or any of that.
translation.it: Non sapevo che si parlasse al cesso.

translation.en: My bunkie was like, "There's some guys banging on our line."
translation.it: La mia compagna mi fa: "Stanno bussando".

translation.en: -Hello? -What are you talking about?
-Hello. -People were talking into the toilet?
-Like, really? -Yeah?
I miss you!
So, to talk on the toilet bowl, you have to bail out.
translation.it: Per parlare al cesso, tiri l'acqua...

translation.en: You take all the water out, dump it in the sink.
She bailed the toilet out and knocked, and somebody answered.
translation.it: Svuotò il cesso, bussò e le risposero.

translation.en: I was like, "Oh my God, what is happening here?"
translation.it: E io: "Oh mio Dio, è incredibile!"

translation.en: Everybody has their own knock,
because there's people on the eighth floor, on the sixth floor,
translation.it: perché c'è gente all'ottavo piano, al sesto

translation.en: there's people on the fifth floor.
You can even talk to the boys on the fourth floor.
translation.it: Puoi parlare pure con il quarto.

translation.en: You can barely hear them, it's very quiet.
translation.it: Ma è lontano e si sente poco.

translation.en: I hear you, motherfucker.
Is there any bitches on the line?
[female inmate] I've been trying to get bitches on the line for a minute!
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno in linea da un po'!

translation.en: And then you can, like, create a relationship.
I've been missing you all my life.
He was hella hot, and I was like, "Ooh, okay.
translation.it: Era un proprio bel ragazzo e gli ho detto: "Ok,

translation.en: Talk to me."
This is my microphone. Hello?
Oh, hello?
I was like, "Oh, my gosh, this is so cool.
It's like having a cell phone!"
Hey, you hear me?
Who is this?
-It's Graham. -I'm on six.
[female inmate] Are you black or brown? Nah, I'm a white boy.
[male inmate] I'm trying to go out of my way to get ahold of somebody.
translation.it: Sto cercando di contattare una persona specifica.

translation.en: -Whatcha want me to tell her? -I don't know who figured it out,
translation.it: - Che le dico? - Non so chi l'ha inventato,

translation.en: but whoever first did it was a genius,
translation.it: ma chi l'ha fatto è un genio.

translation.en: 'cause that's real science, for real.
[male inmate] Tell him to get on the phone tomorrow.
All right.
He flushed, so he hung up the phone, so...
translation.it: Ha tirato l'acqua, cioè ha riattaccato.

translation.en: That's it.
I see you, bitch.
Be cool.
Okay. Just...
[Monster] I'm in here for 15 days.
-You got 15 days lockdown? -Yeah.
They gave me 15 fucking days.
Damn.
You know she ain't gonna do anything, blood.
That's why she's all hyped up on you, like you gonna save her.
translation.it: È serena, perché pensa che la proteggerai.

translation.en: Just leave it alone.
You know, it's not that big of a deal. Ain't no one going to do shit.
translation.it: Non è così grave e nessuno farà niente.

translation.en: [Noonie] No she isn't.
Who is she talking to? Someone behind me? [chuckles]
translation.it: Con chi ce l'ha? Con me?

translation.en: I know she ain't talking to me.
[inmate] Stop it. Stop it.
We all know you tellin'.
Excuse me? That's one thing I'm not, is no snitch, bitch.
translation.it: Prego? Non sono una spiona, stronza.

translation.en: You got me hella fucked up, bro. That's one jacket you ain't giving me.
translation.it: Ti sbagli. Non puoi darmi questa nomea.

translation.en: I will not wear that one.
You got me hella fucked up. Anyways, get on the phone.
-[Princess] You're cute. -Get on the phone. I know I'm cute.
translation.it: - Sei carina. - Telefona. Sì, lo so.

translation.en: Thank you. At least I got a full set of pearly whites, bitch.
translation.it: Grazie. Almeno io ho ancora tutti i denti. Ho tutti i denti e tu hai i buchi in bocca.

translation.en: Bitch, your teeth about to fall out, bro.
translation.it: Ho tutti i denti e tu hai i buchi in bocca.

translation.en: -You look like a duck, bitch. -[inmate] Andrea.
translation.it: Sei un cesso. Andrea, chiudi la bocca! Basta!

translation.en: -Huh? -Stop.
translation.it: Andrea, chiudi la bocca! Basta! Smettila.

translation.en: Ah shit. That shit's drama.
There's so many haters in here.
They are just jealous.
Okay. All right.
The whole issue with Drea is she speaks on people.
translation.it: Il problema di Drea è che fa la spia alle guardie.

translation.en: There's multiple people who don't like her.
[Drea] One time.
Drea, she's just always running at the mouth.
translation.it: Drea ha la lingua troppo lunga.

translation.en: It's like, either you run up or shut up.
translation.it: Dovrebbe fare squadra con noi e stare zitta.

translation.en: [Princess] Little Miss Monster.
Hey!
Hi, boo.
Some people aren't going to let it slide.
Not me. No more chances with me.
translation.it: Non io. Non le darò altre chance.

translation.en: No more.
I don't know what she's doing, you feel me?
She needs to keep my name out her mouth. What is she trying to do?
translation.it: Capito? Non deve nominarmi più. Cosa vuole da me?

translation.en: [Monster] Tell her to come up here.
[Princess] Bet you she won't.
Monster wants you.
Okay.
What's up?
I never said nothing about you from jump.
translation.it: Non ho spifferato niente di te.

translation.en: -[Monster] Bitch, hold on a second. -I never said nothing about you from jump.
[Monster] Pump your fucking brakes.
I'm not gonna talk to you if that's how you speak to me.
translation.it: Non ti parlo, se fai così.

translation.en: You can talk to me like a grown-ass woman. [Monster] I am talking--
translation.it: - Trattami da adulta. - Io ti tratto--

translation.en: No, you're not, you're cussing at me. Bitch, better calm the fuck down bitch.
translation.it: - No, mi hai offesa. - Vedi di calmarti, stronza.

translation.en: [Drea] I'm done with you.
You're a fucking punk-ass...
Yeah, right. That all you have to say?
translation.it: Sì, certo. Non hai altro da dire?

translation.en: -[Noonie] Bitch, you're scary! -[Monster] Suck my dick, bitch!
translation.it: Tu hai paura! Succhiami il cazzo!

translation.en: -Maybe it's her fucking.... -[unintelligible yelling]
translation.it: Fa tutta la superiore, come se fosse...

translation.en: I'm telling you, she's hella hard right now.
translation.it: Te lo dico, è furiosa adesso.

translation.en: Hella.
Go get your fucking teeth fixed, Princess!
[Princess] Step in the shower now!
Stop.
Step in the shower right now, though.
-[inmate] Stop! -Shut your dog-ass up, bitch.
You're hella ugly, bitch!
Move, move.
Alright, we're gonna lock down day room if you don't stop, alright? [inmate] Yeah, exactly. Stop.
translation.it: - Ora basta, o indico il coprifuoco. - Basta.

translation.en: Stop.
-[Princess] Meet me at the shower though -[inmate] Stop.
Look at me. Stop, please?
Stop.
That's why every bitch I've been talking to,
you wanna get in on my nigga's line every single time.
translation.it: tu ti metti sempre in mezzo.

translation.en: That's why I snatched your bitch, that's right!
Miss me with that, bitch.
Go fix your teeth.
With your ugly ass.
Who do you think you're talking to, Drea? Who do you think you're talking to, Drea?
translation.it: Tu non sai con chi hai a che fare!

translation.en: [control agent] Day room's on lockdown.
[male officer] We need to lock it down, now!
